summaries.name: Believer's Boon
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: all(@wis_score>=13,"alignment must be within one step of your deity's")

summaries.name: Believer's Hands
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: all(@wis_score>=13,@feat:believers_boon,@alignment:lg,"alignment must be within one step of your deity's")

summaries.name: Blessed Striker
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: all(@bab>=11,@ability:divine_caster,"alignment must be within one step of your deity's")

summaries.name: Energy Channel
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: all(@ability:channel_energy#warpriest,"Air, Earth, Fire, or Water domain or blessing")

summaries.name: Intimidating Performance
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: any("ability to start a performance (or raging song) as a move action",@ability:bardic_performance,@ability:raging_song#skald)
